price: ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߏߟߘߊ ߟߋ߬ ߕߏߕߐ߫ ߸ ߞߟߊ߬ߒ߬ߞߋ߬ߦߊ ߣߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ߡߙߊ߬ߒ߬ߞߋ߬ߦߊ ߕߌ߱
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
